text: Barassi is a common Italian surname. As a name, it may refer to: * Abd-Rabbo al-Barassi, self-declared head of the government of Barqa, the eastern half of Libya * Ludovico Barassi (1873-1956), Italian jurist; one of Italy's leading authorities on civil law * Ottorino Barassi (died 1971), Italian sports official * Pierre-Louis Barassi (born 1998), French rugby union player * Ron Barassi (born 1936), Australian rules football player and coach It may also refer to: * Barassi (play), a play by Tee O'Neill about Ron Barassi * Coppa Ottorino Barassi, defunct amateur association football competition Category:Italian-language surnames
title: Barassi
